Generated Narrative: SearchParameter MedicationRequest-subject-given

MedicationRequestSubjectGivenSearchParameter

Parameter subject.given:string

Searches for MedicationRequest based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?subject:Patient.given={givenName}

ResourceMedicationRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesMedicationRequest
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: MedicationRequestSubjectGivenSearchParameter
description: Searches for MedicationRequest based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?subject:Patient.given={givenName}
